game.name: Sauna Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Run your own sauna: buy a room, equip it with an oven and start earning money from it. Hire employees, ensure safety and, of course, have fun!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run your own sauna: buy a room, equip it with an oven and start earning money from it. Hire employees, ensure safety and, of course, have fun!
